Interface IMatrix

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CsrMatrix, MatrixDecorator, MatrixFeatureLabels, MatrixObjectLabel

    • Method Detail

      • getRow

        java.util.List<PairI> getRow(int i)
        Parameters:
        i - the row index
        Returns:
        A list of integer pairs describing the i-th matrix row such as (j, w) where j is the column of the i-th row element and w its weight

      • getColumn

        java.util.List<PairI> getColumn(int j)
        Parameters:
        j - the column index
        Returns:
        A list of integer pairs describing the j-th matrix column such as (i, w) where i is the row of the j-th column element and w its weight

      • getNbElements

        int getNbElements()
        Returns:
        the number of non-null x_ij in the Matrix, basically less than to getNbRows() * getNbColumns()

      • getNbRows

        int getNbRows()
        Returns:
        the number of rows

      • getNbColumns

        int getNbColumns()
        Returns:
        the number of columns

      • getSumRow

        int getSumRow(int i)
        Parameters:
        i - the row you need to get the sum
        Returns:
        sum over the i-th row of the matrix

      • getSumCol

        int getSumCol(int i)
        Parameters:
        i - the column you need to get the sum
        Returns:
        sum over the i-th column of the matrix

      • getLabelOfCol

        java.lang.String getLabelOfCol(int j)
        Parameters:
        j - - the index of column corresponding to the feature one wants to obtain the label
        Returns:
        the label matching with the j-th matrix column

      • getLabelOfRow

        java.lang.String getLabelOfRow(int i)
        Parameters:
        i - - the index of row corresponding to the object one wants to obtain the label
        Returns:
        the label matching with the i-th matrix row

      • getIndexOfRowLabel

        int getIndexOfRowLabel(java.lang.String label)
        Parameters:
        label - - the label ones wants to get the id
        Returns:
        the i-th row matching with the label

      • getIndexOfColLabel

        int getIndexOfColLabel(java.lang.String label)
        Parameters:
        label - - the label ones wants to get the id
        Returns:
        the j-th column matching with the label
